headline: Regions Bank Names Brandon Greve Head of Regions Investment Services; Additional Leadership Promotions Announced
summary: BIRMINGHAM, Ala., April 07, 2025--Regions Bank on Monday announced Brandon Greve has been named head of Regions Investment Services, part of the bank’s Wealth Management division. Greve succeeds Jim Nonnengard, who is retiring following a 43-year career in financial services.

raw.headline: Regions Bank Names Brandon Greve Head of Regions Investment Services; Additional Leadership Promotions Announced

headline: Why ManpowerGroup, Regions Financial, And Nexstar MediaAre Winners For Passive Income
summary: Companies with a long history of paying dividends and consistently hiking them remain appealing to income-focused investors. ManpowerGroup, Regions Financial, and Nexstar Media have rewarded shareholders for years and recently announced dividend increases. These companies currently offer dividend yields of around 4%-5%. ManpowerGroup ManpowerGroup (NYSE:MAN) provides workforce solutions and services under the Talent Solutions, Manpower, and Experis brands worldwide. Don't Miss: ‘Scrolling To UBI
